# Introduction {#intro}

This book introduces important concepts of clinical biostatistics 
and is intended to accompany the lecture "STA404 Clinical Biostatistics" 
at the University of Zurich, Switzerland. 

*Disclaimer*: These lecture notes are a living document that are
under continuous development. We do not guarantee that they do not contain any 
mistakes. If you detect mistakes or have other comments, you are
very welcome to report them to Leonhard Held or Charlotte Micheloud.
